name: Infinity Platforms
description:
Journey through the colorful, simplistic and amazing world that is Infinity platforms. What seems like an easy relaxed journey in the beginning, is destined to become fraught with danger. With simple one tap controls, you’ll need fast reactions, cunning timing and nerves of steel to reach the safety of the checkpoints.
Guide a lost sphere through a minimal world of Infinity platforms.

Features:
• Over 60 Checkpoints to reach
• Amazing Minimal World
• Relax Ambient Soundtrack
• Simple One-Touch Controls
• Game Center Leaderboard
